| HistoryText             = The Ethicals were a group of five humans who were evolved into godlike beings when in a fit of rage Machine Man unleashed a torrent of energy after seeing a man shot by a mugger. 

The Ethicals considered Machine Man to be their father and chastised him for his agression. Then they left Earth to explore the cosmos. {{r|Machine Man Vol 1 12}}

Quasar would find them many years later among the Stranger's test subjects on the Stranger's world.{{r|Quasar Vol 1 14}}
